name: create_entry
description: Create a new journal entry with optional context, tags, and significance classification

arguments.name: entry_type
arguments.desc: Type of entry (personal_reflection, technical_achievement, milestone, etc.)

arguments.name: is_personal
arguments.desc: Whether this is a personal vs project entry

arguments.name: tags
arguments.desc: Array of tags to associate with the entry

name: search_entries
description: Search journal entries using full-text search with highlighting

arguments.name: query
arguments.desc: Search terms to find in entries

arguments.name: limit
arguments.desc: Maximum number of results to return

arguments.name: is_personal
arguments.desc: Filter by personal vs project entries

name: semantic_search
description: Vector similarity search using sentence transformers and FAISS (full version only)

arguments.name: query
arguments.desc: Search query for semantic similarity matching

arguments.name: limit
arguments.desc: Maximum number of results to return

arguments.name: is_personal
arguments.desc: Filter by personal vs project entries

name: get_recent_entries
description: Retrieve the most recent journal entries

arguments.name: limit
arguments.desc: Number of recent entries to retrieve

arguments.name: is_personal
arguments.desc: Filter by personal vs project entries

name: list_tags
description: List all tags with usage statistics

name: create_entry_minimal
description: Minimal entry creation for debugging purposes
